allTitles: {"cak":"Richin man niqak'än ta ri COVID-19","en":"Avoid Covid-19","es":"Cómo evitar el COVID-19"}

10.cak: Jantape ta ch'aja' ri aq'a', takusaj ya' chuqa' xab'on.  Ruk'amon chuqa' takusaj liq' xab'on.

11.cak: Mani nachäp ri awäch, ri atza'm chuqa' ri achi'.

12.cak: K'o chi natz'apij ri achi chuqa' ri atz'am rik'in jun wuj su't toq yatat'ixäm chuqa' toq yatojb'er. K'a ri k'o chi chanin nak'äq ri su't wuj.

13.cak: Taya' ka'i' metro a kojol kik'in ri ch'aqa' chïk winaqi'.

14.cak: Wi k'o k'atän chawij, k'o ojob' chawe' chuqa' wi man yatikir ta najiq'aj awuxla', chanin takanoj jun aq'omanel.

15.cak: Kan k'o chi nawak'axaj ri rutzijol pa ruwi' ri COVID-19. Kan tanimaj kitzij ri nikib'ij ri aq'omanela' pa ruwi' re yab'il re'.

17.cak: ¿Achike ruk'amon nab'än richin man nak'än ta re coronavirus?

bookText.cak:
Richin man niqak'än ta ri COVID-19

Ruchituy Tijonïk richin Paxil Kayala'
Tijonïk pa ka'i' Ch'ab'äl pa ka'i' B'anob'äl

Richin man niqak'än ta ri COVID-19
Illustrations:  Ari and Elaine Vitikainen 

Information was taken from WHO websites such as https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019/advice-for-public

Version 27.3.2020
Literacy for Women in Africa


978-9929-794-28-3
Jantape ta ch'aja' ri aq'a', takusaj ya' chuqa' xab'on.  Ruk'amon chuqa' takusaj liq' xab'on.
Mani nachäp ri awäch, ri atza'm chuqa' ri achi'.
K'o chi natz'apij ri achi chuqa' ri atz'am rik'in jun wuj su't toq yatat'ixäm chuqa' toq yatojb'er. K'a ri k'o chi chanin nak'äq ri su't wuj.
Taya' ka'i' metro a kojol kik'in ri ch'aqa' chïk winaqi'.
Wi k'o k'atän chawij, k'o ojob' chawe' chuqa' wi man yatikir ta najiq'aj awuxla', chanin takanoj jun aq'omanel.
Kan k'o chi nawak'axaj ri rutzijol pa ruwi' ri COVID-19. Kan tanimaj kitzij ri nikib'ij ri aq'omanela' pa ruwi' re yab'il re'.
Tojtob'enik
¿Achike ruk'amon nab'än richin man nak'än ta re coronavirus?
jantape nab'än moloj
jantape nach'äj aq'a'
jantape nab'än etz'anen



Tojtob'enik
¿Achike ruk'amon nab'än kik'in ri winaqi'?
naya' a kojol k'ik'in
yatetz'an kik'in
namol awi' kik'in
bookText.spa:
Cómo evitar el COVID-19



Cómo evitar el COVID-19

summary: Forma parte de la serie de libros en idiomas mayas para el cuidado y prevención de contagios por coronavirus, incluye audio y preguntas de comprensión.
title: Richin man niqak'än ta ri COVID-19
